fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 1Y CAD
fixes.dax_expression:
IF(
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "12 Month" ||
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "12 Month Swap" ||
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "1 Yr" ||
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "1 Yr Swap" ||
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "10 Month" ||
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "11 Month" ||
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "10 Month Swap" ||
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "11 Month Swap" ||
    (
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Market Subtype] = "Major Curve" &&
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days] > 274 &&
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days] <= 365
    ) ||
    (
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Market Subtype] = "6m Basis" &&
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days] > 274 &&
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days] <= 365 &&
        CONTAINSSTRING('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL], "FRA")
    ),
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T CAD] + 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Fix Value T],
    0
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF...THEN...ELSE to DAX IF(), replaced Tableau CONTAINS(...) with DAX CONTAINSSTRING(), and transformed all field references to the 'Table'[Column] format using the calculation's table name. This is a row-level expression (no aggregations or parameters), so it is implemented as a calculated column.
